title: FS: N172 Old Judge SGC 30/2 John Barnes St. Pauls

posts.post_title: FS: N172 Old Judge SGC 30/2 John Barnes St. Pauls
posts.post_content: SGC 30/2 graded Old Judge N172 John Barnes. $450 shipped in U.S., net to me. I will ship via USPS in a bubble envelope with tracking. If interested, please contact me at: [url]timwhitman@comcast.net[/url]. Thanks!
